data.title: Crohn's & Colitis Foundation
data.text:
Michigan Chapter

Welcome to the Michigan Chapter!

We serve the entire state of Michigan and Northwest Ohio through funding research, raising awareness, and providing education and support to IBD patients. Learn more about our upcoming events, chapter news, and volunteer opportunities by clicking the links below.

Thanks for visiting!

Interested in receiving our monthly chapter newsletter?

Stay informed with event updates, new volunteer opportunities, and the latest IBD research! Email us to sign up!

Sign up for our Monthly eNewsletter!

To subscribe to our monthly Crohns and Colitis Newsletter, kindly provide some information about yourself

reCAPTCHA helps prevent automated form spam.

The submit button will be disabled until you complete the CAPTCHA.

Chapter Events

Camp Oasis of Michigan

Fenton, MI

Evening of Hope

The 47th Annual Evening of Hope is the Michigan Chapterâ€™s largest fundraiser. This evening of celebration offers a moving program including impactful honorees, inspiring mission moments, elegant dinner, live auction, and a room filled with prestigious guests.

Detroit, MI

Champions for a Cure

Join us for the 11th Annual Champions for a Cure as we celebrate the West Michigan IBD community together. We can't wait to see you all on Friday, October 25th for an unforgettable evening!

Grand Rapids, MI

See More

Join a Support Group!

We encourage you to attend these local programs to connect with others around specific IBD-related topics, share resources, and find the community to support you on your journey.
